attributes.action: Kill off the UK Digital Economy Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Facebook against UK Digital Economy Bill.

Kill off this bill now!

Vote now to kill off this stupid bill before it's too late and made law.

This bill restricts your rights to use the internet and just makes big corporations even more powerful than they already are now.

Any website or peer-2-peer network thought by a court to be breaking copyright law could be switched off or blocked at the national level be they UK or International based.

Photographers will also be affected in that if an original works aurthor can't be found then the content publisher will own the copyright as an orphan work.

Anyone found thought to have illegal material will be easier to sue, or suspend their internet ISP access etc, etc.

"The effect isn't clear. For example, would the Daily Telegraph have been able to publish the MPs expenses scandal without its website being blocked? The expenses are Crown Copyright." taken from theregister

Lets get this in the news people. Your internet rights are being taken away without consent. ACT NOW!
